test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Functionality Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom workflow engine correctly handles parallel processing paths, complex exception handling, and site-specific business rules as specified in URS-MES-004.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly processes parallel paths without errors.

test_steps.action: Simulate a deviation and trigger exception handling.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly handles the deviation according to predefined rules.

test_steps.action: Apply site-specific business rules to a batch record.
test_steps.expected_result: System enforces site-specific rules accurately.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel paths processed correctly
Deviations handled as per rules
Site-specific rules enforced accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data changes are logged
Audit trail must capture all actions

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom mobile application correctly captures and processes shop floor data entry as specified in URS-MES-006.

test_steps.action: Enter sample data using the mobile application.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is captured accurately and transmitted to the MES.

test_steps.action: Verify data integrity in the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Data in MES matches the entered data.

test_steps.action: Simulate network interruption during data entry.
test_steps.expected_result: Application handles interruption and resumes data entry correctly.

acceptance_criteria: Data captured accurately
Data integrity maintained
Network interruptions handled correctly
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data entries are logged
Audit trail must capture all actions

test_cases.test_name: Custom Dynamic In-Process Control Limits Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom algorithms for dynamic in-process control limits based on multivariate analysis function as intended.

test_steps.action: Initiate a test batch record with predefined process parameters.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is successfully created and displayed in the system.

test_steps.action: Simulate process deviations by altering input parameters.
test_steps.expected_result: System dynamically adjusts control limits based on multivariate analysis.

test_steps.action: Verify the adjusted control limits against expected values.
test_steps.expected_result: Adjusted control limits match the expected values from the multivariate model.

acceptance_criteria: System correctly adjusts control limits in real-time.
All adjustments are logged in the audit trail.
data_integrity_requirements: All adjustments must be traceable and auditable.
No unauthorized changes to control limits.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom mobile application correctly captures and transmits shop floor data to the MES.
prerequisites: Mobile application installed on test device

test_steps.action: Log in to the mobile application using test credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully authenticated and granted access to the application.

test_steps.action: Enter sample data for a test batch record using the mobile application.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is captured without errors and displayed in the application.

test_steps.action: Submit the entered data to the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and appears in the MES batch record.

acceptance_criteria: All entered data is accurately transmitted to the MES.
Data integrity is maintained throughout the process.
data_integrity_requirements: All data entries must be traceable to the user.
No data loss during transmission.

test_cases.test_name: Custom MES Integration with Proprietary Equipment
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom MES successfully integrates with proprietary equipment using custom interfaces and protocols.

test_steps.action: Initiate a test batch record in the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is successfully created and visible in the MES interface.

test_steps.action: Send a command from the MES to the proprietary equipment.
test_steps.expected_result: Equipment receives the command and initiates the process as expected.

test_steps.action: Monitor real-time data exchange between MES and equipment.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is exchanged with a maximum latency of 2 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: MES successfully integrates with all proprietary equipment
Data exchange latency is within 2 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Verify no data loss or corruption

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Handling Parallel Processing Paths
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom workflow engine's ability to handle parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate a test batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is successfully created and parallel paths are initiated.

test_steps.action: Monitor the execution of parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: All parallel paths execute without errors and complete as expected.

test_steps.action: Verify exception handling for deviations in parallel paths.
test_steps.expected_result: Exceptions are handled according to predefined rules and logged appropriately.

acceptance_criteria: Workflow engine handles parallel processing paths correctly
Exceptions are handled as per predefined rules
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during parallel processing
Verify no data loss or corruption

test_cases.test_name: Custom MES Integration with Proprietary Equipment
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom MES successfully integrates with proprietary equipment using custom interfaces and protocols.

test_steps.action: Initiate data transfer from proprietary equipment to MES
test_steps.expected_result: Data is received by MES within 2 seconds

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer latency does not exceed 2 seconds
Data accuracy is 100%
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transfer
Audit trail captures all data transactions

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Handling Parallel Processing Paths
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom workflow engine handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate parallel processing paths in the workflow engine
test_steps.expected_result: All paths are processed correctly without errors

acceptance_criteria: All parallel paths are processed correctly
No errors are logged
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity across all paths
Audit trail captures all workflow actions

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom APIs developed for third-party system integration function as intended.

test_steps.action: Initiate API call to third-party system with test data
test_steps.expected_result: Third-party system responds with expected data

acceptance_criteria: API calls return correct data within expected time
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Data Collection Latency Check
test_cases.objective: Ensure real-time data collection operates with a maximum latency of 2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Simulate data collection from multiple sources simultaneously
test_steps.expected_result: Data is collected and processed within 2 seconds

acceptance_criteria: All data collected within 2 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure no data loss during high-speed collection

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Shop Floor Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: To verify that the custom mobile application correctly captures and processes shop floor data entries in real-time.

test_steps.action: Enter sample data into the mobile application fields.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is captured accurately and displayed in the application interface.

test_steps.action: Submit the data through the mobile application.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted to the MES and appears in the batch record.

acceptance_criteria: All data entries are accurately captured and transmitted to the MES.
No data loss or corruption occurs during transmission.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be complete, consistent, and accurate.
Audit trail must capture all data entries and transmissions.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Analytics Module Real-Time Process Monitoring
test_cases.objective: To validate that the custom analytics module provides real-time process monitoring with accurate data analysis.

test_steps.action: Initiate a test batch process and monitor using the analytics module.
test_steps.expected_result: Real-time data is displayed accurately in the analytics module interface.

test_steps.action: Analyze the process data using the module's proprietary algorithms.
test_steps.expected_result: Analysis results are consistent with expected process parameters.

acceptance_criteria: Real-time data is displayed with a maximum latency of 2 seconds.
Analysis results match expected process parameters.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be complete, consistent, and accurate.
Audit trail must capture all analysis activities.

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom APIs developed for third-party system integration function as intended.

test_steps.action: Initiate API call to third-party system with test data.
test_steps.expected_result: API call is successful and data is correctly received by the third-party system.

acceptance_criteria: API calls are successful
Data integrity is maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data is not altered during transmission

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality of the custom mobile application for shop floor data entry.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into the mobile application on the shop floor.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accurately captured and transmitted to the MES system.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately captured
Data is transmitted without errors
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data is not altered during entry or transmission

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration Test for Third-Party Systems
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom-developed APIs can successfully integrate with third-party systems as specified in URS-MES-014.
prerequisites: Test data prepared for integration scenarios

test_steps.action: Invoke the custom API to send a test batch record to the third-party system.
test_steps.expected_result: Third-party system receives the batch record without errors.

test_steps.action: Retrieve a batch record from the third-party system using the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is successfully retrieved and matches the sent data.

acceptance_criteria: All API calls complete successfully within expected timeframes.
Data integrity is maintained during transmission.
Error handling is properly implemented for failed transactions.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must not be altered during transmission.
All transactions must be logged with timestamps.

test_cases.test_name: Proprietary Message Queuing for Equipment Communication
test_cases.objective: Validate the proprietary message queuing system can handle real-time communication with manufacturing equipment as per URS-MES-015.
prerequisites: Manufacturing equipment connected to test environment
Test messages prepared for various scenarios

test_steps.action: Send a test message from the MES to a manufacturing equipment unit.
test_steps.expected_result: Equipment receives the message and processes it correctly.

test_steps.action: Simulate a high-load scenario with multiple concurrent messages.
test_steps.expected_result: All messages are processed without loss or corruption.

acceptance_criteria: All messages are delivered within the 2-second latency requirement.
No message loss or corruption occurs during transmission.
System recovers gracefully from communication failures.
data_integrity_requirements: Messages must maintain integrity during transmission.
All message transactions must be logged for audit purposes.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes all parallel paths without errors.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel processing paths are executed correctly
No errors in the system logs
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data entries are accurate and complete

test_cases.test_name: Custom APIs for Third-Party System Integration Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom APIs for seamless integration with third-party systems.

test_steps.action: Send a test data request via the custom API to the third-party system.
test_steps.expected_result: Third-party system receives and processes the request correctly.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately exchanged between systems
Response time meets performance requirements
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Shop Floor Data Entry Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom mobile application correctly captures and processes shop floor data entry in real-time.
prerequisites: Shop floor data entry forms available

test_steps.action: Enter sample data into the mobile application form.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is captured without errors and displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Submit the data through the mobile application.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted to the MES and stored in the database.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately captured and transmitted
No data loss or corruption
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Verify data accuracy

test_cases.test_name: Custom APIs Integration Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom APIs correctly integrate with third-party systems and handle data exchange.

test_steps.action: Send a test data request from the MES to a third-party system using the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Third-party system receives the request and processes it correctly.

test_steps.action: Receive a response from the third-party system and verify data integrity.
test_steps.expected_result: Response data is accurately received and processed by the MES.

acceptance_criteria: Data exchange is accurate and complete
No data loss or corruption
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during exchange
Verify data accuracy

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine correctly handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate two parallel batch processing paths in the workflow engine.
test_steps.expected_result: System successfully creates and manages both parallel processing paths without conflicts.

test_steps.action: Introduce a deviation in one processing path while the other continues.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly handles the exception without affecting the parallel path.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel paths complete as designed
Exceptions are handled without cross-path interference
System maintains all required audit trails
data_integrity_requirements: Complete audit trail of parallel path execution
No data corruption between paths

test_cases.test_name: Real-time Data Collection Latency Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that real-time data collection meets the 2-second maximum latency requirement.

test_steps.action: Simulate process data generation from 10 equipment units simultaneously.
test_steps.expected_result: System captures all data points within 2 seconds of generation.

test_steps.action: Increase load to 100 concurrent data streams and measure latency.
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains sub-2-second latency under maximum load.

acceptance_criteria: 100% of data points collected within 2 seconds
No data loss during peak loads
System remains stable under stress
data_integrity_requirements: Complete data capture verification
Timestamp accuracy validation

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Shop Floor Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom mobile application correctly captures and transmits shop floor data entry to the MES system.

test_steps.action: Launch the custom mobile application on the shop floor device.
test_steps.expected_result: Application launches successfully and displays the login screen.

test_steps.action: Log in to the application using valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and is directed to the main menu.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into the batch record fields.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is entered correctly and displayed in the application.

test_steps.action: Submit the data to the MES system.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and appears in the MES system.

acceptance_criteria: All data entered is accurately captured and transmitted to the MES system.
No data loss or corruption during transmission.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be complete, consistent, and accurate.
Audit trail must capture all data entry actions.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Analytics Module Real-Time Process Monitoring
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom analytics module's ability to monitor and analyze process data in real-time.

test_steps.action: Start the manufacturing process and generate real-time process data.
test_steps.expected_result: Process data is generated and available for monitoring.

test_steps.action: Launch the custom analytics module.
test_steps.expected_result: Module launches successfully and displays the monitoring dashboard.

test_steps.action: Monitor the real-time process data using the analytics module.
test_steps.expected_result: Module correctly displays and analyzes the process data.

test_steps.action: Generate a real-time process monitoring report.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated successfully and contains accurate analysis.

acceptance_criteria: Real-time process data is accurately monitored and analyzed.
Reports are generated within the specified time frame.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be complete, consistent, and accurate.
Audit trail must capture all monitoring actions.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine's ability to handle parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate multiple parallel processing paths in the workflow engine.
test_steps.expected_result: All parallel paths are processed without errors or conflicts.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel paths complete successfully
No errors reported in logs
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data is accurately captured and stored

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Third-Party Systems
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom APIs developed for third-party system integration.

test_steps.action: Execute API calls to integrate with a third-party system.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully exchanged between systems without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data exchange is accurate and complete
API response time within acceptable limits
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transfer

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom mobile application correctly captures and processes shop floor data entry as per URS-MES-006.

test_steps.action: Log in to the mobile application using shop floor user credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the data entry interface.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into the mobile application for a batch record.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is correctly entered and saved in the system.

test_steps.action: Verify the entered data in the MES system.
test_steps.expected_result: Data matches the input from the mobile application.

acceptance_criteria: All data entries must match the input from the mobile application.
No data loss or corruption during transfer.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete.
Audit trail must capture all data entries.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Analytics Module Process Monitoring
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom analytics module provides real-time process monitoring as per URS-MES-007.

test_steps.action: Start a test batch process and ensure real-time data feed is active.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch process starts successfully and data feed is active.

test_steps.action: Monitor the process using the custom analytics module.
test_steps.expected_result: Module displays real-time process data accurately.

test_steps.action: Verify the analytics module's response to process deviations.
test_steps.expected_result: Module correctly identifies and alerts on deviations.

acceptance_criteria: Real-time data must be displayed with maximum 2-second latency.
All process deviations must be correctly identified and alerted.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and timely.
Audit trail must capture all process monitoring events.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Shop Floor Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom mobile application correctly captures and processes shop floor data entry in real-time.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into the mobile application.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is captured and displayed correctly in the application interface.

test_steps.action: Submit the data to the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and stored in the MES database.

acceptance_criteria: All data entries are accurately captured and stored.
Data transmission latency is within 2 seconds.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission.
Verify data accuracy post-submission.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Reporting Module Performance Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the performance of the custom reporting module for complex queries.

test_steps.action: Execute a complex query using the reporting module.
test_steps.expected_result: Query execution starts immediately.

test_steps.action: Monitor the query execution.
test_steps.expected_result: Query completes within 10 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Complex queries complete within 10 minutes.
Query results are accurate and complete.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during query execution.
Verify result accuracy post-execution.
